about_the_game:
You live in a world where most men can't get it up and, due to a declining birthrate, society has had to adapt. Now that only a select few males are able to make babies, those precious individuals are allowed to claim any female partner as their very own "Pleasure Pet" to combat the low birthrate menace!

For as long as you can remember you've been living with Kaede, a gorgeous mother, and her sexy daughter Ayane. Surrounded by these beautiful babes every single day your lust finally reaches a breaking point and it turns out YOU are one of the rare males capable of impregnation. Obviously the first thing you must do is to claim the mother and daughter pair as your very first Pleasure Pets!

With your legendary status as a breeder, enjoy the benefits of your Mother Daughter Pleasure Pets by getting into all kinds of naughty fun. Take them on X-rated walks in the park, make them howl with joy in the bedroom, and partake in pervy play on the streets. Just make sure they are nice and pregnant in the end.

Thank you for doing your part for the re-population effort!


  • Translated version of the original Japanese Visual Novel
  • Main female characters fully voiced with original Japanese dialogue
  • Original artwork HD upscaled with 16:9 and 4:3 variants
  • Hours of story content
  • Enhanced with character sprite animations
  • Gallery and Scene selections
  • 19 scenes filled with spectacular images of "societal mandated bonding" with your Pleasure Pets.

Mother Daughter Pleasure Pets is the English localization of a Visual Novel originally created by prolific Japanese developer Norn/Miel. We at Cherry Kiss aim to provide an authentic Japanese Visual Novel experience to gamers outside of Japan.

** PLEASE NOTE **
All characters described and visually represented in this game are over 18 years of age, and no actual, nor identifiable minor was used in the production of this game.

highlighted.name: First day of the rest of your life
These babes were made for walking

content_descriptors.notes:
- Large portions of the game include nudity and graphic descriptions of sexual activities.
- There are scenes of sexual intercourse involving pregnant characters. 
- Some sexual encounters begin with dubious consent.
- The characters engage in consensual pet play.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 10.6+
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX-compatible

name: Mother Daughter Pleasure Pets

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 / 8 / 8.1 / 10
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX compatible
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX-compatible sound

short_description: While most men can't get it up you can't get it to go down. In a world flipped upside-down in a panic over declining birthrates that means you have a duty to breed! Claim a sexy mother and her bomb-shell daughter as your personal Pleasure Pets and embark on a journey of birthrate busting X-rated adventures.
supported_languages: English, Spanish - Latin America, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
